title: Eroded 3d/outlined font
author: mustangpinky1

comments.content:
Gatecrasher Texan:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/gatecrasher-texan.font?text=HLEARDING](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160333/http:/www.whatfontis.com/gatecrasher-texan.font?text=HLEARDING "http://www.whatfontis.com/gatecrasher-texan.font?text=HLEARDING")

Clarendon Black with some artificial condensing and distressing could replicate the look:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160333/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/")
Thanks for the help. Now onto recreating the offset.
